entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Periods of light snow over eastern sections late this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of light snow. Periods of light snow over eastern sections this evening. Local amount 5 cm over eastern sections. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
